original_text: Hannah was speaking in her heart; only her lips moved, and her voice was not heard. Therefore Eli took her to be a drunken woman.
korean_text: 한나가 속으로 말하매 입술만 움직이고 음성은 들리지 아니하므로 엘리는 그가 취한 줄로 생각한지라

sentences.original_text: Hannah was speaking in her heart
and her voice was not heard
Therefore Eli took her to be a drunken woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 엘리는 그녀가 취한 여자라고 생각했습니다
